Why do you recommend this restaurant?: They have the best sauce and generous, family-style portions
It is non authentic but super delicious LA inspired Ramen. The flavors hits a diverse population.
Delicious bbq and a great atmosphere.

What is the address of this restaurant?: 91 East 7th Street, New York, New York, 10009
Why do you recommend this restaurant?: They serve delicious food that's reasonably priced. Can't beat that.

The staff are all lovely people, they have really good food including meaty and vegan stews for cold weather, brunch fare that is a notch above your usual, and drinks (boozy and non-alcoholic) that are refreshing and creative.
I've only had takeout from here but they have a huge selection of Indian food, from appetizers to curries to other entrees. Everything has so much flavor and tastes amazing.
Good food and great atmosphere at affordable prices.
It serves tasty and healthy Korean food for a reasonable price. They use homemade Tofu for all dishes, instead of factory made tofu.
I love seafood and the ambiance is great because you feel like you are in a boat. The service is great as well as the wine.
